:root :where(.wp-block-post-title){font-size: var(--wp--preset--font-size--x-large);font-weight: 700;margin-top: 1.25rem;margin-bottom: 1.25rem;}
:root :where(.wp-block-post-title a:where(:not(.wp-element-button))){text-decoration: none;}
:root :where(.wp-block-post-title a:where(:not(.wp-element-button)):hover){text-decoration: underline;}
:root :where(.wp-block-post-title a:where(:not(.wp-element-button)):focus){text-decoration: underline dashed;}
:root :where(.wp-block-post-title a:where(:not(.wp-element-button)):active){color: var(--wp--preset--color--secondary);text-decoration: none;}
/*# sourceURL=global-styles-inline-css */
</style>
<style id='wp-block-social-links-inline-css'>
.wp-block-social-links{background:none;box-sizing:border-box;margin-left:0;padding-left:0;padding-right:0;text-indent:0}.wp-block-social-links .wp-social-link a,.wp-block-social-links .wp-social-link a:hover{border-bottom:0;box-shadow:none;text-decoration:none}.wp-block-social-links .wp-social-link svg{height:1em;width:1em}.wp-block-social-links .wp-social-link not (prefers-reduced-motion){.wp-block-social-link{transition:transform .1s ease}}.wp-block-social-link{height:auto}.wp-block-social-link a{align-items:center;display:flex;line-height:0}.wp-block-social-link:hover{transform:scale(1.1)}.wp-block-social-links </style>
<style id='wp-block-columns-inline-css'>
.wp-block-columns{box-sizing:border-box;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap!important}@media (min-width:782px){.wp-block-columns{flex-wrap:nowrap!important}}.wp-block-columns{align-items:normal!important}.wp-block-columns.are-vertically-aligned-top{align-items:flex-start}.wp-block-columns.are-vertically-aligned-center{align-items:center}.wp-block-columns.are-vertically-aligned-bottom{align-items:flex-end}@media (max-width:781px){.wp-block-columns:not(.is-not-stacked-on-mobile)>.wp-block-column{flex-basis:100%!important}}@media (min-width:782px){.wp-block-columns:not(.is-not-stacked-on-mobile)>.wp-block-column{flex-basis:0;flex-grow:1}.wp-block-columns:not(.is-not-stacked-on-mobile)>.wp-block-column[style*=flex-basis]{flex-grow:0}}.wp-block-columns.is-not-stacked-on-mobile{flex-wrap:nowrap!important}.wp-block-columns.is-not-stacked-on-mobile>.wp-block-column{flex-basis:0;flex-grow:1}.wp-block-columns.is-not-stacked-on-mobile>.wp-block-column[style*=flex-basis]{flex-grow:0}:where(.wp-block-columns){margin-bottom:1.75em}:where(.wp-block-columns.has-background){padding:1.25em 2.375em}.wp-block-column{flex-grow:1;min-width:0;overflow-wrap:break-word;word-break:break-word}.wp-block-column.is-vertically-aligned-top{align-self:flex-start}.wp-block-column.is-vertically-aligned-center{align-self:center}.wp-block-column.is-vertically-aligned-bottom{align-self:flex-end}.wp-block-column.is-vertically-aligned-stretch{align-self:stretch}.wp-block-column.is-vertically-aligned-bottom,.wp-block-column.is-vertically-aligned-center,.wp-block-column.is-vertically-aligned-top{width:100%}
/*# sourceURL=https://www.frbsf.org/wp-includes/blocks/columns/style.min.css */
</style>
<style id='wp-block-group-inline-css'>
.wp-block-group{box-sizing:border-box}:where(.wp-block-group.wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained){position:relative}

</style>
<style id='sffed-blocks-sffed-breadcrumbs-style-inline-css'>
.wp-block-sffed-blocks-sffed-breadcrumbs{font-size:var(--wp--preset--font-size--x-small)}.wp-block-sffed-blocks-sffed-breadcrumbs ol{padding:0}.wp-block-sffed-blocks-sffed-breadcrumbs ol,.wp-block-sffed-blocks-sffed-breadcrumbs ul{list-style:none;list-style-image:none}.wp-block-sffed-blocks-sffed-breadcrumbs li{display:inline-block;font-weight:600;text-transform:uppercase}.sffed-breadcrumbs__link{font-weight:600;text-decoration:none;text-transform:uppercase}.wp-block-sffed-blocks-sffed-breadcrumbs--separator{color:var(--wp--preset--color--primary-navy);display:inline-block;font-size:15px;font-weight:600;margin:0 .5rem;opacity:.25}.tax-podcasts-series .wp-block-sffed-blocks-sffed-breadcrumbs--separator,.tax-topics-type .wp-block-sffed-blocks-sffed-breadcrumbs--separator{color:var(--wp--preset--color--primary-silver)}.tax-podcasts-series .sffed-breadcrumbs__link a,.tax-topics-type .sffed-breadcrumbs__link a{color:var(--wp--preset--color--base)}

-webkit-focus-ring-color;outline-offset:3px}.wp-lightbox-container button:hover{cursor:pointer;opacity:1}.wp-lightbox-container button:focus{opacity:1}.wp-lightbox-container .close-button:not(:hover):not(:active):not(.has-background){background:none;border:none}.wp-lightbox-overlay .lightbox-image-container{height:var(--wp--lightbox-container-height);left:50%;overflow:hidden;position:absolute;top:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);transform-origin:top .wp-block-image .wp-block-image figcaption{display:none}.wp-lightbox-overlay button{background:none;border:none}.wp-lightbox-overlay .scrim{background-color:#fff;height:100%;opacity:.9;position:absolute;width:100%;z-index:2000000}.wp-lightbox-overlay.active{visibility:visible}@media not (prefers-reduced-motion){.wp-lightbox-overlay.active{animation:turn-on-visibility .25s both}.wp-lightbox-overlay.active img{animation:turn-on-visibility .35s @font-face{font-family:"Greycliff CF";font-style:italic;font-weight:400;font-display:fallback;src:url('https://www.frbsf.org/wp-content/themes/sffed/assets/fonts/greycliff-cf/GreycliffCF-RegularOblique.woff2') format('woff2');font-stretch:normal;}
@font-face{font-family:"Greycliff CF";font-style:normal;font-weight:600;font-display:fallback;src:url('https://www.frbsf.org/wp-content/themes/sffed/assets/fonts/greycliff-cf/GreycliffCF-DemiBold.woff2') format('woff2');font-stretch:normal;}
@font-face{font-family:"Greycliff CF";font-style:normal;font-weight:700;font-display:fallback;src:url('https://www.frbsf.org/wp-content/themes/sffed/assets/fonts/greycliff-cf/GreycliffCF-Bold.woff2') format('woff2');font-stretch:normal;}
</style>
	<script>
		(function($) {
			$(document).on('facetwp-refresh', function() {
				$('.facetwp-template').prepend('<div class="is-loading">Loading...</div>');
			});
			$(document).on('facetwp-loaded', function() {
				$('.facetwp-template .is-loading').remove();
			});

			$(document).on('facetwp-refresh', function() {
				if (FWP.soft_refresh == true) {
					FWP.enable_scroll = true;
				} else {
					FWP.enable_scroll = false;
				}
			});
			$(document).on('facetwp-loaded', function() {
				if (FWP.enable_scroll == true) {
					$('html, body').animate({
						scrollTop: $('.sffed-facetwp--pattern').offset().top // Scroll to the top of the element with class "sffed-facetwp--pattern"
					}, 30);
				}
			});
		})(jQuery);
	</script>
	<script>
		(function($) {
			$(document).on('facetwp-loaded', function() {
				if (!FWP.loaded && 0 == FWP.settings.pager.total_rows) {
					FWP.loaded = true;
					FWP.reset();
					$("#sffed-facetwp-form").remove();
				}
			});
		})(jQuery);
	</script>
</head>

<body class="wp-singular sffed_publications-template-default single single-sffed_publications postid-256209 wp-embed-responsive wp-theme-sffed">
  <!-- Google Tag Manager (noscript) -->
  <noscript><iframe src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-MR34JJF7"
  height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe></noscript>
  <!-- End Google Tag Manager (noscript) -->

		</div>
		

	</div>
	

</div>
</header>
</div>
</header>




<main class="wp-block-group is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow">

  
  <div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained">
    <nav class="wp-block-sffed-blocks-sffed-breadcrumbs " aria-label="breadcrumb"><ol><li><a class="sffed-breadcrumbs__link" href="https://www.frbsf.org" aria-label="home icon"><span class="sffed-home-icon"><svg width="13" height="12" viewBox="0 0 13 12" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><title>Home</title><path d="M12.9998 5.85366L6.49992 0L0 5.85366L0.000164297 5.85381V12.0001H13V5.85372H12.9998L12.9998 5.85366Z"></path></svg></span></a><span class="wp-block-sffed-blocks-sffed-breadcrumbs--separator">/</span></li><li><a class="sffed-breadcrumbs__link" href="/research-and-insights/">Research &amp; Insights</a><span class="wp-block-sffed-blocks-sffed-breadcrumbs--separator">/</span><a class="sffed-breadcrumbs__link" href="/research-and-insights/publications">Publications</a><span class="wp-block-sffed-blocks-sffed-breadcrumbs--separator">/</span><a href="https://www.frbsf.org/research-and-insights/publications/working-papers/" rel="tag">Working Papers</a></li></ol></nav>
    <h1 style="margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50);" class="wp-block-post-title">The Work-from-home Wage Premium</h1>
  </div>
  


  <div class="entry-content wp-block-post-content has-global-padding is-layout-constrained">

    
    <div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-14 has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-columns-is-layout-constrained">
      
      <div class="sffed-authors-sidebar-block wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:20%">
        <div class='sffed-associated-people__heading'>Authors<hr style='width: 35px;margin: 0.5rem 0 1rem'></div><div class="sffed-associated-people-wrapper"><div class="sffed-associated-person"><img width="247" height="300" src="https://www.frbsf.org/wp-content/uploads/Experts_Li_sm.jpg?quality=100&amp;w=247" class="sffed-associated-person__photo wp-post-image" alt="" style="width: 125px;height: 125px;object-fit: cover;object-position:top;overflow: hidden" /><p class="sffed-has-margin-bottom-none sffed-associated-people--centered"><a href='#huiyu-li'>Huiyu Li</a></p></div><div class="sffed-associated-person"><p class="sffed-has-margin-bottom-none sffed-associated-people--centered">Julien Sauvagnat</p></div><div class="sffed-associated-person"><p class="sffed-has-margin-bottom-none sffed-associated-people--centered">Tom Schmitz</p></div></div>
        <p class="clear-both is-download has-x-small-font-size sffed-has-margin-top-none"><a class="sffed-has-no-underline" href="https://www.frbsf.org/wp-content/uploads/wp2026-02.pdf">Download PDF<br> (391 KB)</a></p>
        
        <nav id="frbsf-toc"
          data-content="{&quot;heading&quot;:&quot;Contents&quot;,&quot;listType&quot;:&quot;ul&quot;}"
          class="wp-block-create-block-sffed-table-of-content" style="margin-top: var(--wp--preset--spacing--50);">
        </nav>
        

      </div>
      

      
      <div class="sffed-main-content wp-block-column sffed-heading--greycliff is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:65%">

        <p class='sffed-meta-kicker has-primary-blue-color has-text-color sffed-has-margin-top-none sffed-has-padding-top-none sffed-has-margin-bottom-add--medium'>2026-02 | February 2, 2026</p>  
  <meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2026-02-02" />

  

        

        <div class="entry-content wp-block-post-content is-layout-flow wp-block-post-content-is-layout-flow">
<p>Using administrative data from France, we document that within the same detailed occupation, industry, and commuting zone, workers who work from home earn on average 12% higher hourly wages than fully on-site workers. Approximately half of this wage premium is accounted for by observable worker characteristics (such as education, gender, and age) and firm characteristics (such as size and productivity). The remaining 6% wage premium largely reflects selection: workers who work from home after the COVID-19 pandemic already earned higher wages before the pandemic.</p>



<p><em>Suggested citation:</em></p>



<p>Huiyu Li, Julien Sauvagnat, and Tom Schmitz. 2026. The Work-from-home Wage Premium. Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco Working Paper 2026-02. https://doi.org/10.24148/wp2026-02</p>
</div>

        

        

        <div style="margin-bottom:3rem;">
          <hr class="sffed-hr__dotted" style="margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)" /><div class="is-layout-constrained"><span style="padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:600">Topics</span><span style="padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20)"><a class="sffed-footer__link sffed-is-teal" style="color:var(--wp--preset--color--primary-teal);text-transform:uppercase" href="https://www.frbsf.org/topics/covid-19-pandemic/">COVID-19 Pandemic/Recovery</a></span><span style="padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20)"><a class="sffed-footer__link sffed-is-teal" style="color:var(--wp--preset--color--primary-teal);text-transform:uppercase" href="https://www.frbsf.org/topics/demographics/">Demographics</a></span><span style="padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20)"><a class="sffed-footer__link sffed-is-teal" style="color:var(--wp--preset--color--primary-teal);text-transform:uppercase" href="https://www.frbsf.org/topics/global-economy/">Global Economy</a></span><span style="padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20)"><a class="sffed-footer__link sffed-is-teal" style="color:var(--wp--preset--color--primary-teal);text-transform:uppercase" href="https://www.frbsf.org/topics/labor-markets/">Labor Markets</a></span><span style="padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20)"><a class="sffed-footer__link sffed-is-teal" style="color:var(--wp--preset--color--primary-teal);text-transform:uppercase" href="https://www.frbsf.org/topics/wages/">Wages and Compensation</a></span></div>
        </div>

        <div class='sffed-associated-people__heading--in-content-flow sffed-has-margin-bottom-add'>About the Authors</div>	<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex">
		<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:23%">
			<div class="sffed-associated-person"><img width="247" height="300" src="https://www.frbsf.org/wp-content/uploads/Experts_Li_sm.jpg?quality=100&amp;w=247" class="sffed-associated-person__photo--square wp-post-image" alt="" style="width: 125px;height: 125px;object-fit: cover;object-position:top;overflow: hidden" />
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis: 66.66%;padding-top:.5em">
			<div class="sffed-associated-person__bio" id="huiyu-li">
Huiyu Li is a research advisor in the Economic Research Department of the Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco. Learn more about <a href="https://www.frbsf.org/our-people/economists/huiyu-li/" aria-label="Learn more about Huiyu Li">Huiyu Li</a>		</div>
	</div>
</div><div id='julien-sauvagnat' class='sffed-has-margin-bottom-add--medium'></div><div id='tom-schmitz' class='sffed-has-margin-bottom-add--medium'></div>

        <div style="margin-bottom:3rem;">
          
        </div>
      </div>
      

      
      <div class="sffed-social-media-share-sidebar wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:85px">
      </div>
      
    </div>
    

  </div>

  
  <div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained">
    <div class="wp-block-columns alignfull has-base-color has-primary-teal-background-color has-text-color has-background" style="padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)">
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center">

				aria-label="Share on Facebook"

				<svg width="44" height="44" viewBox="0 0 24 24" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false">

	</div>
	

	

	
	

	<div class="wp-block-columns alignfull has-text-color has-background has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-columns-is-layout-constrained is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow">
		
		<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
			<p> 2026 Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco</p>
		</div>
		

		
		<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">

<script type="speculationrules">
{"prefetch":[{"source":"document","where":{"and":[{"href_matches":"/*"},{"not":{"href_matches":["/wp-*.php","/wp-admin/*","/wp-content/uploads/*","/wp-content/*","/wp-content/plugins/*","/wp-content/themes/sffed/*","/*\\?(.+)"]}},{"not":{"selector_matches":"a[rel~=\"nofollow\"]"}},{"not":{"selector_matches":".no-prefetch, .no-prefetch a"}}]},"eagerness":"conservative"}]}
</script>
<script id="wp-block-template-skip-link-js-after">
	( function() {
		var skipLinkTarget = document.querySelector( 'main' ),
			sibling,
			skipLinkTargetID,
			skipLink;

		// Early exit if a skip-link target can't be located.
		if ( ! skipLinkTarget ) {
			return;
		}

		/*
		 * Get the site wrapper.
		 * The skip-link will be injected in the beginning of it.
		 */
		sibling = document.querySelector( '.wp-site-blocks' );

		// Early exit if the root element was not found.
		if ( ! sibling ) {
			return;
		}

		// Get the skip-link target's ID, and generate one if it doesn't exist.
		skipLinkTargetID = skipLinkTarget.id;
		if ( ! skipLinkTargetID ) {
			skipLinkTargetID = 'wp--skip-link--target';
			skipLinkTarget.id = skipLinkTargetID;
		}

		// Create the skip link.
		skipLink = document.createElement( 'a' );
		skipLink.classList.add( 'skip-link', 'screen-reader-text' );
		skipLink.id = 'wp-skip-link';
		skipLink.href = '#' + skipLinkTargetID;
		skipLink.innerText = 'Skip to content';

		// Inject the skip link.
		sibling.parentElement.insertBefore( skipLink, sibling );
	}() );
	
//# sourceURL=wp-block-template-skip-link-js-after
</script>

	<script>
		(function($) {
			// Prevent page reload when pressing Enter/Return key.
			$(document).keypress(function(event) {
				const keycode = (event.keyCode ? event.keyCode : event.which);
				if (keycode == '13') {
					event.preventDefault();
					const in_use = false;
					$.each(FWP.facets, function(name, val) {
						if (val.length > 0) {
							in_use = true;
						}
					});
					if (in_use) {
						FWP.parseFacets();
						FWP.setHash();
						$(".fwp-submit").trigger("click");
					}
				}
			});
			// Hide facets with no options.
			document.addEventListener('facetwp-loaded', function() {
				$.each(FWP.settings.num_choices, function(key, val) {
					const $facet = $('.facetwp-facet-' + key);
					const $wrap = $facet.closest('.sffed-navigation__filter--details');
					const $flyout = $facet.closest('.flyout-row');
					if ($wrap.length || $flyout.length) {
						const $which = $wrap.length ? $wrap : $flyout;
						(0 === val) ? $which.hide(): $which.show();
					}
				});
			});
		})(jQuery);
	</script>
</body>
</html>
